value.name: Arraignments delayed for Davis murder suspects
value.description: His co-defendant, 21-year-old Zackary Thomas Sandeno ... Neither police nor prosecutors have offered details as to why the killing is being considered a gang-related crime, and Supervising Deputy District Attorney Garrett Hamilton declined to comment ...

value.name: Accused killer in Davis stabbing pleads out; co-defendants’ charges dismissed
value.description: Courtesy photo The case’s chief prosecutor, Garrett Hamilton, then dismissed the pending murder, assault and criminal-street gang charges against Vergara’s co-defendants — Carlos Biviescas, Martyn Contreras, Anthony Rivera, Joseph Sandeno and Zackary ...
